item.title: The Next Battlefield Can Have Its Cake and Eat It Too
item.description:
Highlights

  • The next Battlefield game must balance realism with light-hearted humor to satisfy fans' desires for historical accuracy and eccentricity.
  • Fans hope the next Battlefield campaign will bring back the beloved Bad Company vibes with comedic and rule-breaking soldier personas.
  • Multiplayer in the next Battlefield should focus on realism, featuring historically accurate weapons and immersive environments for an authentic experience.

The Battlefield franchise has been going through somewhat of an identity crisis in recent years. Back when Battlefield debuted in the early 2000s, its primary identity was being a multiplayer military shooter with a dash of historical realism. That identity remained a staple of the Battlefield franchise throughout the first decade of its life, with a grounded tone being at the forefront of every entry until Battlefield 1 's release in 2016. Battlefield V and 2042 , however, took a step back from the rest of the franchise's realism and its more grounded tone, introducing mechanics like 2042 's Specialist system that didn't quite fit with Battlefield 's prior identity.

As a result, the next Battlefield game needs to tread very carefully with its tone. Many fans are desperate to see a return to the series' grounded, more historically accurate roots, while a handful of other fans would prefer the franchise to lean a bit more into its surreal or eccentric side. But there might be a way for the next Battlefield to achieve both simultaneously.

The Next Battlefield Can Deliver Both Fan-Requested Tones At Once

The Next Battlefield's Campaign Can Have Bad Company Vibes

Though Battlefield 3 and 4 had fairly engaging campaign modes centered around fictional present-day conflicts, and Battlefield 1 and V 's War Stories offered a compelling set of anthology missions set in WW1 and WW2 respectively, these games don't usually take the crown for the best Battlefield campaign, at least according to most fans. Instead, it's often the Battlefield: Bad Company duology that gets the most praise for its story mode.

Something that sets Battlefield: Bad Company 's two campaigns apart from those found in the rest of the franchise is their lighter tones, with both stories revolving around the titular group of rule-breaking, troublemaking soldiers. These larger-than-life personalities add a distinct sense of humor to the Bad Company games, and it's a tone that many fans have wanted to see return. The next Battlefield could finally deliver on this long-standing fan request with its campaign, which could offer a more lighthearted, even comedic Battlefield story by following Bad Company 's formula and bringing a new set of over-the-top heroes to the table.

The Next Battlefield's Multiplayer Can Strive for Realism

But while many fans would want to see a lighter tone for Battlefield 's next campaign, many more want the Battlefield series to return to its realistic roots, which is something the next entry's multiplayer mode could offer. The next Battlefield 's multiplayer portion should embrace realism more so than ever before, bringing back immersive features like realistic in-game chatter between allies and impressive destruction technology. It would also be great to see a return to more historically accurate weapons, gadgets, and vehicles in the next Battlefield , or if the next entry is not set in the past, then at least weapons and vehicles that feel authentic and logical for the era.

This realism also needs to extend to the next Battlefield 's multiplayer maps. The layout of buildings and city roads needs to feel logical, environments need to look detailed, and there should be plenty of interactive features, such as functional elevators, building interiors, and moving pieces of scenery. With a multiplayer mode that strives for realism, and a campaign mode that takes itself a bit less seriously than past entries, the next Battlefield could manage to strike a perfect balance between the two opposing tones that different parts of the fan-base want to see.

item.title: Roblox: Battle Pets TD Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Battle Pets TD is a Roblox experience in which you'll have to conquer islands and defend bases from waves of enemies with your pets, which can be upgraded and risen from eggs. There are many different pets available in the game, each of which has its own unique attributes and elements. You will be challenged with numerous levels of varying difficulties and rewards, so, to be able to complete the most challenging ones, use Battle Pets TD codes to obtain currency and buy or upgrade your wholesome animals.

Updated August 19, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We are always happy to share new codes, but it appears that the developers have not added any new yet. Stay tuned for future updates.

All Battle Pets TD Codes

Working Battle Pets TD Codes

  • Countdown – Redeem this code to get 200 Coins.
  • LaunchDay – Redeem this code to get 100 Coins.

Expired Battle Pets TD Codes

How to Redeem Codes in Battle Pets TD

The redemption system in this game is similar to other Roblox games, so if you are an experienced player, you shouldn't have any difficulties. However, if you're a beginner or don't know how to redeem codes in Battle Pets TD specifically, follow our tips below.

  • Foremost, launch Battle Pets Tower Defense .
  • In the lower left corner of the screen, you will see four round buttons.
  • Click on the one with a purple plate with “ABX” text.
  • After that, a field for entering the code will appear in the lower-left corner of the screen.
  • Enter one of the active codes mentioned above and press Enter.

If you do everything correctly, the code field will display “Success” and you will receive your reward.

How to Get More Battle Pets TD Codes

To keep up with the latest Roblox codes and not miss the chance to get free rewards and new pets, bookmark and follow this page. We also suggest you follow the game's social networks, as they are the primary source of new codes from the game's developers, and you can have a lot of fun there and even make new game mates:

  • Official Battle Pets TD Discord Group
  • Official Battle Pets TD Roblox Group

More Games Like Battle Pets TD

If you enjoyed this game or want to find something similar to play, Roblox has a wide variety of games to suit all tastes, and we suggest you check out the similar Tower Defense games mentioned below:

  • Roblox: Five Nights Tower Defense
  • Roblox: Anime Defenders
  • Roblox: Skibidi Tower Defense

item.title: Roblox: Heroes World Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Heroes World Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Heroes World
  • How to Get More Heroes World Codes

Heroes World is an RPG in which players defend a city and fight crime using various elemental powers. Although the game is a simple Roblox experience, it has many interesting quests and a sound combat system. The game can become even more exciting if players have the opportunity to try out more powers. Fortunately, by redeeming Heroes World , they'll have a chance to get the rarest powers in the game and become the strongest.

Updated August 19, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Unfortunately, we did not find any new codes in this update. However, don't be disappointed as new codes may be coming soon.

All Heroes World Codes

Active Heroes World Codes

  • welcomeback - Enter this code to get 5 spins and 3 rare spins.
  • almost500k - Enter this code to get 14 spins.
  • ultra480k - Enter this code to get 12 spins.
  • 470kplus - Enter this code to get 12 spins.
  • epic460k - Enter this code to get 12 spins.
  • 450kLIKES! - Enter this code to get 12 spins.
  • the440k - Enter this code to get 12 spins.
  • 430kcode - Enter this code to get 12 spins.
  • 420k - Enter this code to get 12 spins.
  • 380kCODE! - Enter this code to get spins.
  • 370klikes - Enter this code to get spins.
  • 360kgoal - Enter this code to get spins.
  • easter340k - Enter this code to get spins.

Expired Heroes World Codes

  • thank350k
  • the250k
  • newyearsupdate23
  • mhmchristmas22
  • turkey22
  • season6
  • 330kLIKES
  • 320kday
  • 310kLIKES
  • big300k
  • thank290k
  • 280kLIKES
  • 270kREAL
  • 260ktime
  • 240kCODE

How to Redeem Codes in Heroes World

The method of redeeming codes in Heroes World differs from how you enter codes in other Roblox games, so newcomers may be a bit confused. However, redeeming codes in Heroes World is actually straightforward, and we will show you how in the guide below.

  • Open Roblox and launch Heroes World .
  • Press Play.
  • If you are new to the game, click Spin Power.
  • After selecting power, click Finish.
  • When the game world loads, press M to open the Menu.
  • On the left side of the screen, a field will appear that says "Enter code here!". Paste the code from our list of active codes there. If the code is correct, it will be automatically redeemed, and you will receive rewards.

How to Get More Heroes World Codes

Codes in different Roblox experiences can bring plenty of free rewards. Unfortunately, though, they are often quite difficult to find. That's why you should bookmark this page, as we regularly update it and add new active codes. You can also visit the official PoppaPengo page on X, where the developer often posts information about new codes.

item.title: Roblox: Shinobi Battlegrounds Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Shinobi Battlegrounds is an exciting Roblox game in the Battleground genre in which everyone can experience themselves as part of the Naruto universe. In this game, you have to fight with other players to earn RYO and spend it on rerolls of the best clans and their abilities. However, if you want better bloodlines and epic skills as fast as possible, Shinobi Battlegrounds codes will help you achieve this goal.

Unlike the original Naruto story, you are not limited to one clan's abilities and basic ninjutsu skills. Instead, by leveling up and rerolling your skills, you can experience the skill set of every character from Konoha and other iconic heroes.

Updated August 19, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: The two old codes have been cut, but they have been replaced by two new ones. Redeem to get a lot of freebies.

All Shinobi Battlegrounds Codes

Working Shinobi Battlegrounds Codes

  • GameisBack! - Enter this code to get 8,000 Ryo and Boosters. (NEW)
  • NarutoSoon! - Enter this code to get 8,000 Ryo and Boosters. (NEW)

Expired Shinobi Battlegrounds Codes

  • Sasuke!
  • Boss!
  • Noobttsu!
  • Noobvy!
  • BigRyo!
  • !fix2
  • !Temari
  • OpenTest!
  • !ITACHI
  • !BattleGrounds
  • !1010
  • 3kLikes!
  • !KobiPlays
  • !beAlpha
  • !beBattleGrounds
  • !BugFixes
  • RELEASE!
  • !fix1

While skill timing and practice are critical to winning, leveling up and having the best abilities can be the key to your victory or defeat. Of course, you can endlessly improve your skills, win, and farm RYO for rerolls of new skills, but the developers understand that players love freebies and sometimes share free codes as rewards. However, remember that the Shinobi Battlegrounds codes have a limited expiration date, so hurry up and get all the rewards.

How to Redeem Shinobi Battlegrounds Codes

Luckily for Naruto fans, the redeem codes feature in the Shinobi Battlegrounds is available immediately upon launching the game for the first time. To accomplish this, you only need to go to the main menu of the game and follow these steps:

  • Launch Shinobi Battlegrounds in Roblox .
  • Click on the KG Spin icon.
  • Click on the Spin chest in the center of the screen.
  • Enter the code in the Enter Code Here text box in the lower-left corner of the screen.
  • Click Redeem, and you will receive your rewards.

How to Get More Shinobi Battlegrounds Codes

Like most Roblox games, the Shinobi Battlegrounds developers occasionally update the code list in the game's description on the Roblox platform. However, they do this so rarely, so this method can't be called reliable. Instead, you can check our guide periodically to find more active codes. In addition, you can subscribe to the official pages of the developers to learn about all the news and exclusive rewards before everyone else:

  • Roblox
  • Twitter
  • YouTube
  • Discord

item.title: Call of Duty Zombies Fan Is Turning Gameplay Images Into Gorgeous Paintings
item.description:
Highlights

  • A Call of Duty Zombies fan creates a series of oil paintings to capture the game mode's iconic moments.
  • Fans pay tribute to Zombies mode through art and montages, showcasing love for the popular game mode.
  • Black Ops 6 will introduce third-person mode and HUD customization, but will remove the Carpenter power-up.

An artist created several oil paintings based on gameplay moments from the Call of Duty Zombies experience and shared the impressive works online. The Call of Duty Zombies game mode will make an appearance in the long-running franchise's next entry, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 .

Call of Duty Zombies is a round-based survival mode that first popped up in 2008's Call of Duty: World at War by Treyarch. The experience, which features its own set of characters, maps, and storylines, has since become a staple in Activision's popular shooter series, providing players with an activity that rewards good teamwork and careful planning. One artist, a Reddit user named Senior-Swordfish1361, has attempted to capture some of Call of Duty Zombies ' most memorable scenes on canvas.

Senior-Swordfish1361 recently shared their Call of Duty Zombies oil paintings on Reddit, with their latest creation being centered around the Origins map from Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 that prominently featured giant robots. The artist, who also painted the Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 version of Origins, posted paintings based on four other Call of Duty Zombies maps throughout August, namely Die Rise, Five, Town, and TranZit.

Call of Duty Zombies Oil Paintings

The artist recently shared an oil painting of Highrise from Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 as well. Highrise is considered by many fans to be one of the best maps in the entire Call of Duty franchise, and it has appeared in Call of Duty: Online , Call of Duty: Mobile , and 2023's Call of Duty Modern Warfare 3 . Senior-Swordfish1361 is offering prints of their Highrise and Zombies paintings for $32 apiece. They also have paintings based on other games, including Battlefield 1 , Fallout: New Vegas , and Skate 3 .

Aside from Senior-Swordfish1361, other gamers have paid tribute to Call of Duty 's beloved Zombies mode. In May, TikTok user dig_dug7 produced a touching, almost-Marvel-movie-intro-style montage that featured Zombies' iconic maps, characters, and images.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 's iteration of Zombies will bring plenty of significant changes to the experience, including a third-person mode and more customization options for the HUD. On the other hand, the upcoming Treyarch game, which is scheduled to be released on October 25, will also remove the Carpenter power-up that has been in Zombies since Call of Duty: World at War . The useful Call of Duty Zombies item fully repairs window barriers in maps and provides players with a small amount of points.
